segments.text: I notice the boy stretching for the cookie jar, and it’s making me laugh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so determined, even if he’s about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, her hand open and ready.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both going to get caught, and it’s going to be funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious, and it’s hilarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, but she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is the kind of thing that happens in every family.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable—I hope he doesn’t fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be really surprised when she turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR
